name: Ghost Escape (dargbeast)
description:
You are a test subject of an other-wordly scientific faction. These aliens have imprisoned you within their lab from which you must escape.

Warning: If you are using Firefox, I'd recommend lowering your volume before you start playing as Firefox appears to be ignoring the audio settings in Construct.

This is my first completed game and was created for the GameDevTv GameJam using the free version of Construct3. The theme of the jam is 'Death is only the beginning' and as you'll find out when playing this game, dying is helpful!

Control your movement using 'A' and 'D' to move left/right and 'W' or 'spacebar' to jump.

All sound and art assets included are available for free and are credited as needed on the end screen. Background images were sourced from Pexels and then adapted by me. The player and ghost sprites were sourced from opengameart.org. The sound effect and background music were sourced from freesound.org.
